description: Tired of facing to the side, these kaomojis started dancing whie facing forwards. Also, their arms are still up because isn’t dancing all about the arms anyway? Err, maybe not.. Anyway, have fun with different facial expressions to show how your emote is feeling the music.   ＼(^▽^＠)ノ ヽ(*ﾟｰﾟ*)ﾉ ヽ( °◇°)ノ ヾ(･ω･*)ﾉ ヾ(＠^∇^＠)ノ ヾ(*´∇`)ﾉ ヽ(*´Д｀*)ﾉ ヾ（*⌒ヮ⌒*）ゞ ヾ(*д*)ﾉ ヽ(´ー`)ﾉ ヽ(°◇° )ノ ƪ(˘⌣˘)ʃ ╰(°ㅂ°)╯ ₍₍⁽⁽(ી(^‿ゝ^)ʃ)₎₎⁾⁾ ₍₍⁽⁽(ી(´;ω;` )ʃ)₎₎⁾⁾ ヾ｜￣ー￣｜ﾉ ヘ| ´ω｀ |ﾉ └( ＾ω＾ )」 ┗(｀O´)┛ └| ∵ |┘ ♪└|∵|┘♪ └(･･ ･･･)」 ⁽⁽(ી₍₍⁽⁽(ી⁽⁽(ી₍₍⁽⁽(ી( ˆoˆ )ʃ)₎₎⁾⁾ʃ)₎₎ʃ)₎₎⁾⁾ʃ)₎₎
title: Dancing Forwards with Arms Up
